ilex.frb.FRB

class FRB(name: str = 'FRBXXXXXX', RA: str = '00:00:00.0000', DEC: str = '00:00:00.0000', DM: float = 0.0, bw: int = 336, cfreq: float = 1271.5, t_crop=None, f_crop=None, tN: int = 1, fN: int = 1, t_lim=[0.0, 3100.0], f_lim=[0.0, 336.0], RM: float = 0.0, f0: float | None = None, pa0: float = 0.0, verbose: bool = False, norm='None', terr_crop=None)[source]
Info:

FRB class for Processing of ASKAP FRB data
